name: Flight Pilot Simulator
description:
Become a pilot and fly your commercial airbus to the destination. Navigate and steer your plane through space to ensure you head to the correct destination. Go through different weather conditions and land at your destination airport within the time limit to earn yourself more pilot stripes. When arriving at your destination zone, slow the plane down and prepare for landing, be careful don’t crash! Use your skills to analyze your landing altitude, speed, height and navigation. Guide your plane towards the runway and park within the marked zone to complete the level. While parking your plane, be very careful to avoid crashing the hurdles along the runway.

Features:
- No internet connection Required;
- Highly realistic cockpit aeroplane games interior.
- Each airplane has it's own realistic flight simulation.
- Easy and User Friendly Airplane flight controls
- Amazing 3D graphics and stunning sound effects
